name: Theory Test 2020
description: Join 5 million drivers who learnt using our driving theory test apps. Complete 2020 UK DVSA Car theory test revision materials plus exclusive extras. Be sure you have everything needed to pass your driving theory test first time!   *** UK DVSA Theory Test Questions 2020 ***  Licensed by the DVSA* (Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency) to provide car theory test revision questions, answers and explanations. No other App, CD or book has more questions!   *** Unique Hazard Perception Test Videos ***  CGI and real-life HPT videos made by the DVSA plus extra clips only available here. All videos include interactive scoring with full explanations. Cheat detection software checks whether the way you respond could be flagged as cheating in the real test.   *** Case Studies ***  Unique case studies only available here. Every UK Car theory test now includes a case study.   *** Coach Mode ***  Our intelligent software helps you focus your revision on areas you need the most help with   *** Mock Tests ***  Unlimited mock tests that mimic the real driving theory test   *** Highway Code ***  Free access to the complete Highway Code   *** Track your Progress ***  Records your progress so you can see how youre doing and when youre ready to pass. Save difficult questions to revisit later or just before your driving theory test.   *** Regularly Updated ***  Latest 2020 DVSA Car theory test materials including recent updates to questions, answers and explanations plus brand new CGI Hazard Perception videos.   *** Professional Explanations ***  Every question and video explains what you need to know and how to improve your score   *** Need Help? ***  Contact our UK-based support team at support@drivingtheorytest.org   *** Advertisement Free ***  Uninterrupted revision with no distractions   *** Works Offline ***  Get as much practice as you need without worrying about data usage   *** Search Function ***  Find specific questions quickly and easily   ____________________________________   This app is designed for learner car drivers who need to practice for the UK DVSA driving theory test in order to obtain a driving license.  * Crown Copyright material reproduced under licence from the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency which does not accept any responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction. Deep River Development is a limited company based in Cambridge, UK.
